response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which we believe holds significant value and potential for growth in your business or personal endeavors. This opportunity is truly unique and offers unparalleled benefits that could significantly impact your future positively. Considering the exceptional quality and versatility of our product, we are extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire it at a special price of $950,000. We understand that the true worth of this product may be subjective, but we are confident that this price reflects its immense value and potential. We look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable addition to your goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Let's embark on this journey together towards success.", "product_price": 950000}
